thread.title: Motorists gear up for nine months of roadworks
thread.title_full: Motorists gear up for nine months of roadworks | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Motorists gear up for nine months of roadworks
text:
Play video Commuters in and around Bournemouth faced long delays this morning as nine months of major roadworks began on the main route in and out of the town.
22 million pounds is being spent rebuilding the A338 Spur Road between the Blackwater junction and Ashley Heath near Ringwood.
Only one lane is open in both directions along a ten mile stretch.
Surrounding roads through Christchurch, Parley and Ferndown were also clogged as fed-up drivers tried to find diversions. Martin Dowse reports.
Last updated Mon 7 Sep 2015 Read more 3 updates Nine months of roadworks on main route into Bournemouth and Poole Travel Dorset
